shortDescription: Get a new instance of a third-party library.

returns.name: lume
returns.description: A new instance of the lume library.

usages.name: middleclass
usages.shortDescription: A simple OOP library for Lua. It has inheritance, metamethods (operators), class variables and weak mixin support.

returns.name: class
returns.description: A new instance of the middleclass library.

returns.name: bump

returns.description: A new instance of the vector library.

usages.name: spritesheet
usages.shortDescription: The SpriteSheet of DiskOS, as documented in the objects section.
usages.longDescription:
But this is the spritesheet creation function, which takes in a GPU image, and the width & height of the sprites in the spritesheet.
```lua
local SpriteSheet = Library("spritesheet")
local mySpriteSheet = SpriteSheet(myImage, 8,8)
```

returns.name: SpriteSheet
returns.description: A new copy of the SpriteSheet creation function.
